TEXT: "LEGÉNYBÚCSÚ" above "DE SEMMI" above "BUZULÁS". Clean, bold, distressed all-caps condensed sans-serif typography for the top and bottom rectangular headline banners with rough grunge texture and worn edges; oversized heavy display letterforms for the central "DE" and stacked bold condensed letters for "SEMMI". Include a centered high-contrast black-and-white vector portrait of a smiling man in suit wearing aviator sunglasses rendered as a simplified stencil/halftone silhouette with crisp white highlights and matching rough texture to integrate with the distressed type. Composition is compact and stacked with the two grunge banner bars framing the portrait and middle text, balanced negative space, precise vector edges and print-ready separations. Add clear white inner padding between graphic elements and the outer black sticker contour. Isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows.
